Explainer: What will happen to Oscar Pistorius when he is released from jail?Former Paralympic star Oscar Pistorius will be released from prison on Friday after he was granted parole nearly 11 years after killing his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 11:26:41 GMT VJRHMLXSSFOZ5FWSOIE5GZKCXM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/what-will-happen-oscar-pistorius-when-he-is-released-from-jail-2024-01-02/Reuters世界非洲
All passengers, crew escape blaze on Japan Airlines plane after Tokyo airport collisionAll 379 passengers and crew of a Japan Airlines plane miraculously escaped from a fire following a collision with a Coast Guard aircraft at Tokyo's Haneda airport on Tuesday, but local media said most of the coast guard plane crew had died. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:19:52 GMT 5EXEWXVS3JISFNFZAFPKGYW4NI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/fire-breaks-out-plane-runway-japan-tokyo-haneda-airport-nhk-2024-01-02/Daniel Leussink世界亚太地区
Turkey says it rounds up 33 suspected spies for Israel's MossadTurkish police detained 33 people suspected of spying for Israel's Mossad intelligence service and of targeting foreigners living in Turkey, Interior Minister Ali Yerlikaya said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 09:19:30 GMT 5A4UHGP75JNUJDKYTQCUCHNHXM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-detains-33-people-suspected-of-espionage-israeli-mossad-state-media-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中东地区
Disputes over China ties sour Taiwan election campaignBitter disputes on how to handle relations with China and avoid conflict are dominating the final stretch of election campaigning in Taiwan, as some polls show a tight race between the main two contenders to be the island's next president. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:46:33 GMT WXNDKD7MFVINPMIBZXUEV5I7FQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/disputes-over-china-ties-sour-taiwan-election-campaign-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Somalia rejects Ethiopia-Somaliland port deal and summons ambassadorSomalia said on Tuesday a pact its breakaway region of Somaliland has signed with Ethiopia allowing it to use the Red Sea port of Berbera had no legal force and threatened regional stability. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 06:29:01 GMT T4O2RZGYVNPOXLTXRJMKFG4BDA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/somalia-cabinet-calls-emergency-meet-ethiopia-somaliland-port-deal-2024-01-02/Abdi Sheikh世界非洲
Thailand, China to waive visas for each other's citizens from MarchThailand and China will permanently waive visa requirements for each other's citizens from March, Thai Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin said on Tuesday. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 04:16:02 GMT CNCHISFHI5P5FNY5PPDSFFGVYI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-china-permanently-waive-visas-each-others-citizens-march-thai-pm-2024-01-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Hong Kong tycoon Lai pleads not guilty in landmark security trialHong Kong tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai pleaded not guilty on Tuesday in his landmark trial, where he is accused of endangering China's national security, as prosecutors laid out details of what they said was collusion with foreign forces. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:52:36 GMT B2HKYXPKQRKVXIYWEEQ5LTZE4U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-tycoon-jimmy-lai-pleads-not-guilty-in-national-security-Trial-2024-01-02/Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam世界亚太地区
China calls on Taiwan's people to promote 'peaceful reunification'The head of China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Tuesday called on Taiwan's people to promote the process of "peaceful reunification", saying it was the common desire of people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 03:25:47 GMT G5RJI3MSHJLIXGHF52TZVBONRM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-calls-taiwan-people-promote-peaceful-reunification-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中国
Russia pounds Ukraine with missiles and drones, five deadRussia fired scores of missiles and drones at the Ukrainian capital Kyiv and the northeastern city of Kharkiv on Tuesday, killing at least five civilians, wounding dozens and causing widespread damage, officials said. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 02:41:22 GMT T26CYFOYZZLMNEFUAEZB3P​​6HLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-drone-attack-kyiv-ukraine-says-2024-01-02/Olena Harmash, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
South Korea opposition chief stabbed in neck, in intensive careSouth Korean opposition Democratic Party leader Lee Jae-myung was stabbed in the neck during a visit to the southern city of Busan on Tuesday and was airlifted to Seoul after receiving emergency treatment, party and emergency officials said. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 01:57:21 GMT L32PY折叠通用DACGXNSZ2YSY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korean-opposition-chief-stabbed-during-visit-busan-yonhap-2024-01-02/Ju-Min Park, Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
China sees robust travel, tourism demand during New Year's Day holidayTravel in China flourished over the three-day New Year's holiday, with 135 million domestic tourist trips, up 155% from last year, while domestic tourism revenue rose to 79.73 billion yuan ($11.23 billion), data released Monday showed. Tue, 02 Jan 2024 01:15:26 GMT 73Z743AOAVL5RP6RMKAZN66CCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-sees-robust-travel-tourism-demand-during-new-years-day-holiday-2024-01-02/Reuters世界中国
